targets.rawSql:
WITH error_params AS (
  SELECT param_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument 
  AND component IN ('X', 'Y', 'Z', 'A', 'B')
  AND param_name = 'MoveError'
  AND subsystem = 'Compustage'
),

errors AS (
  SELECT v.value_num AS error_code
  FROM data v
  JOIN error_params p ON v.param_id = p.param_id
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument 
    AND $__timeFilter(v.time)
)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS stage_errors
FROM errors;

-- Combined aperture error counts
WITH
-- First error source: MoveError
error_params1 AS (
  SELECT param_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument 
    AND component IN ('C1.X', 'C1.Y', 'C2.X', 'C2.Y', 'OBJ.X', 'OBJ.Y', 'SA.X', 'SA.Y')
    AND param_name = 'MoveError'
    AND subsystem = 'Apertures'
),
errors1 AS (
  SELECT 1 AS error
  FROM data v
  JOIN error_params1 p ON v.param_id = p.param_id
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND $__timeFilter(v.time)
),

-- Second error source: *_ErrorState
error_params2 AS (
  SELECT *
  FROM (VALUES
    ('AvaC1', 'C1X', 'C1X_ErrorState'),
    ('AvaC1', 'C1Y', 'C1Y_ErrorState'),
    ('AvaC2', 'C2X', 'C2X_ErrorState'),
    ('AvaC2', 'C2Y', 'C2Y_ErrorState'),
    ('AvaObj', 'OBJX', 'OBJX_ErrorState'),
    ('AvaObj', 'OBJY', 'OBJY_ErrorState'),
    ('AvaSA', 'SAX', 'SAX_ErrorState'),
    ('AvaSA', 'SAY', 'SAY_ErrorState')
  ) AS t(subsystem, component, param_name)
),
matching_params2 AS (
  SELECT p.param_id
  FROM parameters p
  JOIN error_params2 t
    ON p.subsystem = t.subsystem AND p.component = t.component AND p.param_name = t.param_name
  WHERE p.instrument_id = $instrument
),
errors2 AS (
  SELECT 1 AS error
  FROM data v
  JOIN matching_params2 p ON v.param_id = p.param_id
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND $__timeFilter(v.time)
    AND v.value_num != 0
)

-- Final result: counts from both
SELECT
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM errors1) + (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM errors2) AS aperture_errors

WITH matching_params AS (
  SELECT param_id, component, enum_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument 
    AND subsystem = 'Compustage'
    AND param_name = 'MoveError'
    AND component IN ('X', 'Y', 'Z', 'A', 'B')
),

errors AS (
  SELECT
    d.time,
    p.component,
    d.value_num AS error_code,
    p.enum_id
  FROM data d
  JOIN matching_params p ON d.param_id = p.param_id
  WHERE d.instrument_id = $instrument 
    AND $__timeFilter(d.time)
)

SELECT
  e.time AS "Time",
  'Compustage.' || e.component AS "Component",
  en.member_name AS "Error"
FROM errors e
LEFT JOIN enum_values en
 ON en.enum_id = e.enum_id
 AND en.value = e.error_code
ORDER BY e.time DESC;

WITH static_error_params AS (
  SELECT *
  FROM (VALUES
    ('AvaC1', 'C1X', 'C1X_ErrorState'),
    ('AvaC1', 'C1Y', 'C1Y_ErrorState'),
    ('AvaC2', 'C2X', 'C2X_ErrorState'),
    ('AvaC2', 'C2Y', 'C2Y_ErrorState'),
    ('AvaObj', 'OBJX', 'OBJX_ErrorState'),
    ('AvaObj', 'OBJY', 'OBJY_ErrorState'),
    ('AvaSA', 'SAX', 'SAX_ErrorState'),
    ('AvaSA', 'SAY', 'SAY_ErrorState')
  ) AS t(subsystem, component, param_name)
),

matching_params1 AS (
  SELECT param_id, component, enum_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND subsystem = 'Apertures'
    AND param_name = 'MoveError'
    AND component IN ('C1.X', 'C1.Y', 'C2.X', 'C2.Y', 'OBJ.X', 'OBJ.Y', 'SA.X', 'SA.Y')
),

matching_params2 AS (
  SELECT p.param_id, p.component, p.enum_id
  FROM parameters p
  JOIN static_error_params t
    ON p.subsystem = t.subsystem
   AND p.component = t.component
   AND p.param_name = t.param_name
  WHERE p.instrument_id = $instrument
),

all_errors AS (
  SELECT
    v.time,
    p.component,
    v.value_num AS error_code,
    p.enum_id
  FROM data v
  JOIN matching_params1 p ON v.param_id = p.param_id
  WHERE v.instrument_id = $instrument
    AND $__timeFilter(v.time)

  UNION ALL

  SELECT
    v.time,
    p.component,
    v.value_num AS error_code,
    p.enum_id
  FROM data v
  JOIN matching_params2 p ON v.param_id = p.param_id
  WHERE v.instrument_id = $instrument
    AND $__timeFilter(v.time)
    AND v.value_num != 0
)

SELECT
  e.time AS "Time",
  'Apertures.' || e.component AS "Component",
  en.member_name AS "Error"
FROM all_errors e
LEFT JOIN enum_values en
  ON en.enum_id = e.enum_id
  AND en.value = e.error_code
ORDER BY e.time DESC;

WITH params AS (
  SELECT subsystem, component, param_name
  FROM (VALUES
    ('Compustage', 'X', 'X.MaxControllerOut'),
    ('Compustage', 'X', 'X.SettlingDuration'),
    ('Compustage', 'X', 'X.MaxPositionError'),
    ('Compustage', 'X', 'X.PositionError')
  ) AS t(subsystem, component, param_name)
),

label_map AS (
  SELECT * FROM (VALUES
    ('X.MaxControllerOut', 'Max Controller Output'),
    ('X.SettlingDuration', 'Settling Duration'),
    ('X.MaxPositionError', 'Motion Error'),
    ('X.PositionError', 'Position Error')
  ) AS lm(param_name, label)
),

matching_params AS (
  SELECT p.param_id, p.param_name
  FROM parameters p
  JOIN params t
    ON p.component = t.component
   AND p.param_name = t.param_name
   AND p.subsystem = t.subsystem
  WHERE p.instrument_id = $instrument 
),

raw_values AS (
  SELECT
    v.time,
    p.param_name,
    v.value_num
  FROM data v
  JOIN matching_params p ON v.param_id = p.param_id
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument 
    AND $__timeFilter(v.time)
),

agg_values AS (
  SELECT
    param_name,
    MIN(value_num) AS raw_min,
    MAX(value_num) AS raw_max,
    AVG(value_num) AS raw_avg,
    STDDEV(value_num) AS raw_stdev
  FROM raw_values
  GROUP BY param_name
)

SELECT
  COALESCE(lm.label, av.param_name) AS parameter,
  CASE 
    WHEN av.param_name ~* 'Position' THEN
      CASE 
        WHEN '$stat_type' = 'min'   THEN av.raw_min   * 1000
        WHEN '$stat_type' = 'max'   THEN av.raw_max   * 1000
        WHEN '$stat_type' = 'avg'   THEN av.raw_avg   * 1000
        WHEN '$stat_type' = 'stdev' THEN av.raw_stdev * 1000
      END
    ELSE
      CASE 
        WHEN '$stat_type' = 'min'   THEN av.raw_min
        WHEN '$stat_type' = 'max'   THEN av.raw_max
        WHEN '$stat_type' = 'avg'   THEN av.raw_avg
        WHEN '$stat_type' = 'stdev' THEN av.raw_stdev
      END
  END AS value
FROM agg_values av
LEFT JOIN label_map lm ON av.param_name = lm.param_name
ORDER BY parameter;

WITH params AS (
  SELECT subsystem, component, param_name
  FROM (VALUES
    ('Compustage', 'A', 'A.MaxControllerOut'),
    ('Compustage', 'A', 'A.SettlingDuration'),
    ('Compustage', 'A', 'A.MaxPositionError'),
    ('Compustage', 'A', 'A.PositionError')
  ) AS t(subsystem, component, param_name)
),

label_map AS (
  SELECT * FROM (VALUES
    ('A.MaxControllerOut', 'Max Controller Output'),
    ('A.SettlingDuration', 'Settling Duration'),
    ('A.MaxPositionError', 'Motion Error'),
    ('A.PositionError', 'Position Error')
  ) AS lm(param_name, label)
),

matching_params AS (
  SELECT p.param_id, p.param_name
  FROM parameters p
  JOIN params t
    ON p.component = t.component
   AND p.param_name = t.param_name
   AND p.subsystem = t.subsystem
  WHERE p.instrument_id = $instrument 
),

raw_values AS (
  SELECT
    v.time,
    p.param_name,
    v.value_num
  FROM data v
  JOIN matching_params p ON v.param_id = p.param_id
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument 
    AND $__timeFilter(v.time)
),

agg_values AS (
  SELECT
    param_name,
    MIN(value_num) AS raw_min,
    MAX(value_num) AS raw_max,
    AVG(value_num) AS raw_avg,
    STDDEV(value_num) AS raw_stdev
  FROM raw_values
  GROUP BY param_name
)

SELECT
  COALESCE(lm.label, av.param_name) AS parameter,
  CASE 
    WHEN av.param_name ~* 'Position' THEN

    ('Y.SettlingDuration', 'Settling Duration'),
    ('Y.MaxPositionError', 'Motion Error'),
    ('Y.PositionError', 'Position Error')
  ) AS lm(param_name, label)
),

matching_params AS (
  SELECT p.param_id, p.param_name
  FROM parameters p
  JOIN params t
    ON p.component = t.component
   AND p.param_name = t.param_name
   AND p.subsystem = t.subsystem
  WHERE p.instrument_id = $instrument 
),

raw_values AS (
  SELECT
    v.time,
    p.param_name,
    v.value_num
  FROM data v
  JOIN matching_params p ON v.param_id = p.param_id
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument 
    AND $__timeFilter(v.time)
),

agg_values AS (
  SELECT
    param_name,
    MIN(value_num) AS raw_min,
    MAX(value_num) AS raw_max,
    AVG(value_num) AS raw_avg,
    STDDEV(value_num) AS raw_stdev
  FROM raw_values
  GROUP BY param_name
)

SELECT
  COALESCE(lm.label, av.param_name) AS parameter,
  CASE 
    WHEN av.param_name ~* 'Position' THEN
      CASE 
        WHEN '$stat_type' = 'min'   THEN av.raw_min   * 1000
        WHEN '$stat_type' = 'max'   THEN av.raw_max   * 1000
        WHEN '$stat_type' = 'avg'   THEN av.raw_avg   * 1000
        WHEN '$stat_type' = 'stdev' THEN av.raw_stdev * 1000
      END
    ELSE
      CASE 
        WHEN '$stat_type' = 'min'   THEN av.raw_min
        WHEN '$stat_type' = 'max'   THEN av.raw_max
        WHEN '$stat_type' = 'avg'   THEN av.raw_avg
        WHEN '$stat_type' = 'stdev' THEN av.raw_stdev
      END
  END AS value
FROM agg_values av
LEFT JOIN label_map lm ON av.param_name = lm.param_name
ORDER BY parameter;

  SELECT subsystem, component, param_name
  FROM (VALUES
    ('Apertures', 'OBJ.X', 'X.MaxControllerOut'),
    ('Apertures', 'OBJ.X', 'X.SettlingDuration'),
    ('Apertures', 'OBJ.X', 'X.MaxPositionError'),
    ('Apertures', 'OBJ.X', 'X.PositionError')
  ) AS t(subsystem, component, param_name)
),

label_map AS (

    ('X.MaxPositionError', 'Motion Error'),
    ('X.PositionError', 'Position Error')

),

raw_values AS (
  SELECT
    v.time,
    p.param_name,
    v.value_num
  FROM data v

  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument 
    AND $__timeFilter(v.time)
),

agg_values AS (
  SELECT
    param_name,

    MAX(value_num) AS raw_max,

)

list.definition:
SELECT
  id AS __value,
  name || ' [' || model || '] (' || serial || ')' AS __text
FROM instruments
ORDER BY name;
list.name: instrument
list.query:
SELECT
  id AS __value,
  name || ' [' || model || '] (' || serial || ')' AS __text
FROM instruments
ORDER BY name;
